title: Gail Model Breast Cancer Risk Calculator

blocks.text: Confirm eligibility and compute results with the official Gail model tool.

items: Intended for women age 35 to 85 without a prior history of breast cancer or DCIS/LCIS.
If there is a known pathogenic mutation or prior chest radiation, use a different risk model.
Record 5-year and lifetime risk results from the NCI tool in the fields below.

blocks.text: Collect inputs here, open the NCI BCRiskTool in a new tab, then paste results back into this form.
If no prior biopsies, atypical hyperplasia does not apply.
Use this summary for manual entry into the NCI calculator.

This information is not a substitute for professional healthcare and does not replace evaluation by a clinician. Always consult a healthcare provider. Do not disregard professional medical advice or delay seeking care because of this tool.
